description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref. 20342/APP/2024/166, dated 22-03-2024 (Appeal ref. APP/R5510/W/24/3346298, dated 07-11-2024)(Erection of new two storey 3-bed dwelling with basement, new garage, bin storage and associated amenity space, following demolition of existing dwelling.) Removal of basement; Lift location changed in the internal layout; amendments to ground floor fenestration and change of paving material from block to resin.
decision_conditions: The development hereby permitted shall not be carried out except in complete accordance with the details shown on Drawing Numbers:
and shall thereafter be retained/maintained for as long as the development remains in existence.
To ensure the development complies with the provisions of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 1 (2012) and Part 2 (2020), and the London Plan (2021).

Notwithstanding the non-material amendment hereby approved, other than condition 2, which is superseded by the above condition, all other conditions relating to Planning Permission Ref 20342/APP/2024/166, dated 22-03-2024 (Appeal ref. APP/R5510/W/24/3346298, dated 07-11-2024) must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.

All other information approved within the approval of details reserved by a condition application reference 20342/APP/2025/139 dated 14-03-25 shall be implemented in accordance with the approved details bar the paving details and step free access. Alternatively, these details should be re-discharged.
